mutants.original_line: possible_sums.extend([i + power for i in possible_sums])
mutants.mutated_line: possible_sums.extend([i - power for i in possible_sums])

mutants.original_line: possible_sums.extend([i + power for i in possible_sums])
mutants.mutated_line: possible_sums.extend([i * power for i in possible_sums])
